description: This file defines the FilterProvider class, which manages and notifies changes to filter criteria within a Flutter application's state management. It provides methods to update individual filter parameters like height, weight, race, and hair color, and to reset filters to default.

classes.name: FilterProvider
classes.description: A provider class extending ChangeNotifier that holds the current filter criteria, allowing updates and change notifications for filter state management.

methods.name: criteria
methods.description: Getter for the current immutable filter criteria.

methods.name: setCriteria
methods.description: Replaces the current filter criteria with new criteria and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateHeightRange
methods.description: Updates the height range in the filter criteria and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateWeightRange
methods.description: Updates the weight range in the filter criteria and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateRace
methods.description: Updates the race preference in the filter criteria and notifies listeners.

methods.name: updateHairColor
methods.description: Updates the hair color preference in the filter criteria and notifies listeners.

methods.name: reset
methods.description: Resets filter criteria to default values and notifies listeners.
